product.title: STORM Reversible Blades
product.short_description: STORM Reversible Blades – Efficiency, Durability, Savings.
product.long_description: STORM Reversible Blades – Efficiency, Durability, Savings. STORM Reversible Blades are an innovative blade solution for robotic lawn mowers, specifically designed for professional users and the B2B segment, where reliability and total cost of ownership are crucial. 4-Sided Use – Maximum Utilization Each blade is engineered with four cutting edges, allowing it to be flipped and reused up to four times before replacement is needed. This delivers up to 100% longer lifespan compared to traditional 2-sided blades – a significant saving on maintenance and replacement costs. Optimized Steel Alloy – Balanced Strength STORM Reversible Blades are made from a specially developed metal blend that perfectly balances hardness and flexibility: Impact resistant – will not break upon contact with stones. Shape stable – resists bending, ensuring consistent cutting and reducing the risk of uneven grass. Description Compatibility STORM Reversible Blades fit: STORM 2000, STORM 4000, and STORM 6000, plus newer models.
